title: Who is Our Enemy? | Guest Host: Jason Whitlock | 12/21/21
description:
The Blaze's Jason Whitlock guest hosts the Glenn Beck Program and uses sports as a metaphor to illustrate the state of America. Is Silicon Valley our real enemy, and how much influence do Twitter and other social media apps have on society? The Gold Rush of the 19th Century may have started all of this. What is the real history of Northern California? Jason Whitlock breaks down the left's plans to take over the country. How do we combat the democrats’ offense, and what is the best defense against the woke mob?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
